page.title: 20Attitudes to Aith
page.content:
{Attitudes to Aith} "Hit's braaly fine bidin in dis place. Dir's fine burns an lochs tae fish in an it's good waalkin up idda hills wi aa da birds an aa da animals." - Ingrid Johnson "I laek it here wi aa da animals. An dir's plenty ta do idda simmer wi da hay and paets idda holidays." - Valerie Brown
"It's rather nice living in this place. There are nice burns and lochs to fish in and it is good wlking up in the hills with all the birds and all the animals." - Ingrid Johnson !I like it here with all the animals. And there's plenty to do in the summer with the hay and peats in the holidays." - Valerie Brown
Survey by Aith J.H.S. Upper Primary
